com.github.sviperll.meta

Class FilerCodeWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.helger.jcodemodel.AbstractCodeWriter
      • com.github.sviperll.meta.FilerCodeWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class FilerCodeWriter
extends com.helger.jcodemodel.AbstractCodeWriter
    Writes java classes through Filer.

    AbstractCodeWriter to be used with JCodeModel.

    This writer uses Filer to write actual java source files. Filer object is provided by Java-compiler and is available to annotation processors.

    Author:
    Victor Nazarov
    See Also:
    JCodeModel, AbstractProcessor, AbstractCodeWriter, Filer
